mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, DEP_NAME, POS_NAME, HIRE_DATE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEP_ID) LEFT JOIN POSITIONS USING(POS_ID) WHERE USER_NAME Like '%' || #{userName} || '%'
SELECT V.USER_NO, T.VAC_NAME, V.VAC_START, V.VAC_END, V.VAC_AMOUNT, V.STATUS FROM VACATION V LEFT JOIN VACATION_TYPE T ON T.VAC_CODE = V.VAC_CODE WHERE V.USER_NO = #{userNo}
